name: SaaSy
description: I kept hearing about how popular SaaS is getting, so I launched my own SaaS: Screaming (into the void) as a Service! My service is unhackable because no matter how much you scream into the void, it won't do anything! Just to be extra sure, I even put the void I'm using on a totally separate server! I put a flag at /flag on the web server, but it doesn't matter because nobody can ever get it! Here, I'll even tell you how I configured the void! http://web.chal.csaw.io:8080
